website_summaries.verdict: A pair of strong D-rings for a decent price.
pros: Works with lots of different vehicle types
Red, orange, blue, and black available
cons: Check that these rings are compatible with your bumper before purchase

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t break the bank.
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great, was able to put them on quite fast with no problems. Little worried after reading several reviews of ppl saying they turn pink. So let’s see what happens I’ll post back in another month.
customer_reviews.author: Cremar

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic price on a great pair of D-Ring Shackles.
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit and finish, very happy with purchase. Fantastic price on a great pair of D-Ring Shackles.
customer_reviews.author: Keith K.

customer_reviews.title: Decent price for shackles.
customer_reviews.text: These should do good for my tree straps / tow straps. They did however arrive with the powder coating chipped off them.. but that will happen with regular usage anyhow !
customer_reviews.author: Woody's Customs

customer_reviews.title: Great shackles
customer_reviews.text: These heavy duty tow shackles fit great on my Smittybilt rear bumper. Been on for a while now and the paint has not faded or chipped. Havent had to tow anything or anyone yet but I'm sure sooner or later I'll get my Jeep stuck or help out a fellow Jeeper. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: BloodAgentTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great d-rings for the price, fits nice and snugged on the rear bumper of my Jeep. Recommend adding the isolators to keep the paint from chipping when banging on the bumper.
customer_reviews.author: J-West

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty at half the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Well built and very heavy duty. Fits my Body Armor bumper perfectly for my 08 Tacoma and looks sharp. I doubt I'll use these much outside of pulling firewood logs but its nice to have in case I get stuck in the mountains or can help someone else in a pinch. At more than half the price of a major brand its well worth purchasing. I'll be recommending these to anyone looking for some!
customer_reviews.author: Octavian

customer_reviews.title: Look Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great heavy shackles that look great on my jeep Rubicon.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene O

customer_reviews.title: Bee-yoo-tee-ful shackles!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a couple of oversize shackles for farm work. I saw these and liked that they are powder coated. They arrived in record time. The packaging was superb. Cut foam support for each shackle inside a very sturdy box. These are as sturdy and beautiful as advertised. I almost hated to get them dirty, but they've already been used and abused and performed to my expectations. An excellent product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Scooty

customer_reviews.title: Company Stands behind their products.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these D rings and they looked great, however faded from bright cherry red to light pink in about a year. I messaged the company and they quickly responded and sent me another set, free of charge. I have had this set on my truck for over a year with no fading, and even have the old set as a back up! Great product, better company.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: function great but fade
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my rear bumper on my jeep. At first they looked great! However less than 5 months later, they've faded to almost pink. So if you're planning on buying them to actually use them everyday, they're great. But if you're like me and they're going to be used more for show and the occasional use, I'd maybe look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Logan W.

customer_reviews.title: Lost
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how to rate these at first because they seem to be very well made and i was initially very happy when they came. I installed them on my truck and went on a 150 mile trip. When I got back, the shackles were gone!!! I was so disappointed. Somehow they came unscrewed and must have fallen off. Word to the wise, be sure to really tighten the screws on these.
customer_reviews.author: JYoung

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted without the higher price of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted without the higher price of the name brands. Save yourself some money and order these.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Conchas

customer_reviews.title: Open box and check for correct color/item immediately!!!
customer_reviews.text: These were supposed to come “red”. Well they didn’t! I had to purchase spray paint and paint them myself. Don’t know if that’s gonna hold up or not but it is what it is. I didn’t open the box before return date had passed d/t illness of a parent.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bass

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: hard paint coating. Been installed a month in this Texas heat and still look like new. No paint fade. They have a wide opening which makes them a little sloppy on my front bumper but they are snug on my rear bumper.
customer_reviews.author: Augie

customer_reviews.title: Not Red
customer_reviews.text: I received the shackles today and they're black with red pins, not completely red. Not a huge deal, I'm sure they're perfectly functional. But, for those wanting the correct color, be forewarned.
customer_reviews.author: Brick Sprickly

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and sturdy - Don't forget to buy an isolator/washer kit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to add some recovery points to my new metal bumper. They look great. Haven't snatched on em yet. Don't forget to buy some isolators/washers to keep em from rattling around!
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty. Installed on a Jeep Wrangler Rubicon. The brackets in which these shackles attach to can be expensive. Mine were $118 for the pair in addition to these shackles. So keep that in mind. They need to be heavy duty because they could be used to tow the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: TeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Jeep
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for the front of my Jeep, and they are exactly what I was looking for. When I changed my back bumper I needed two more to be complete. Haven’t used them yet, but so far so good. Price was right and they look great on my vehicle
customer_reviews.author: ag

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Items reached us in 2 days and they make the Jeep look great!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth L wheeler

customer_reviews.title: They are big
customer_reviews.text: These shackles were too large for my purpose. But if you need a large pair to attach to your vehicle I think they would work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Although i haven't tested out high rating, i have pulled a couple of vehicles with these and they are holding up well! No issues with paint loss or fading. I've had these on all through the winter and are holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty and look Sharp
customer_reviews.text: I lost 2 shackles recently due to not having used thread locker. So I grab these to match my spotlights on the front of my bumper. Very sharp and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Neitzel

customer_reviews.title: Great clevis
customer_reviews.text: They are very stout and work great. I like that both pieces are painted orange which makes them easy to find when I drop one in the mud or leaves. I've bought these a couple of different times.
customer_reviews.author: TennesseeTom

customer_reviews.title: Wrapped securely in bubble wrap, no chipped coating
customer_reviews.text: For the money these are HD and well made. I think the bumper will give way b4 they do. Very impressed with quality
customer_reviews.author: Change Your Oil

customer_reviews.title: Isolators .......
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these yet but installing them on a 2019 Tundra w/o isolators allows for quite a bit of play. I didn't think it would be a big issue after looking at other brands but having the option of using them (isolators) would eliminate the play issue.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: They are nice and heavy. I also bought d ring shackles to cut back on noise over bumps, rocks, etc. I would give a 5 but the did scratch a little when I was putting them in and tightening them
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Good for recovery
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. As others have said, the powder coat isn’t the best and is starting to fade pretty quickly but they can always be repainted.
customer_reviews.author: StlAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Feel nice but color fades.
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated, the color fades FAST!!! Like insanely fast. But they feel heavy duty otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Ozz

customer_reviews.title: Great - reviewing after one day
customer_reviews.text: they went on I did not lose any paint attaching to my bumper. But that is all I know about them at this point.
customer_reviews.author: S Sargent

customer_reviews.title: Dress up your Jeep
customer_reviews.text: Great accent for my Jeep. Easy to install. While they look great, they also serve a purpose when needed.
customer_reviews.author: marvin marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: They work great but that "UV" resistant finish is crap. Bleached pink in a month Updated: company contacted me and shipped me a new set with a way better coating.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G

customer_reviews.title: Well made & heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product! Heavy duty & exactly what I was looking for. I would point out that the shackles are bigger than I was expecting, but they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Held up
customer_reviews.text: I prefer Crosby for safety but these bad boys held up to the tonnage so I'm cool with them
customer_reviews.author: lawrence franklin

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Added to my emergency kit for snatching cars out of ditches! Good stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Paint job was not good.
customer_reviews.text: Out of box. Paint on lettering was not covering the ridges completely.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and matched my Jeep.
customer_reviews.text: They worked. Haven't had to tow anyone but they seem to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Look great and they work
customer_reviews.text: Used them on my sub 2K camping trailer. Used it to give a honda civic a yank from some mud (truck hooked to trailer trailer to honda) no issues. Seem to be steel and well made.
customer_reviews.author: MaksV

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish of these are very good and they look great on the Jeep.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Miller

customer_reviews.title: little bit of money adds alot of value
customer_reviews.text: really makes a difference on my wifes jeep would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: victor gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Great for my work truck. I have used them a dozen times with no problem pulling trees and friends that get stuck out of mud holes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: These have come in so handy and we haven’t even had them for very long.
customer_reviews.author: pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and a nice bright red color to match my jeep
customer_reviews.author: kristi k.

customer_reviews.title: Paint chipped
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap looking. Def not a good fit for 2019 off road pro 4 runner
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Look great!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, I haven’t had them on for more than a day. Nice pop of color.
customer_reviews.author: Jackelyn

customer_reviews.title: BEEFY!
customer_reviews.text: BEEFY D-rings are ready if you need them. The optional rubber noise buffers work well.
customer_reviews.author: PF50

customer_reviews.title: Look great!
customer_reviews.text: These work well and look good, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: macgyver35

customer_reviews.title: Jeep
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, well machined and look great on the Jeep.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. O. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love how these look on my Jeep. Well built, great price, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S. Caton

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, very sturdy paint coat. (Daughter dropped them three times on concrete in the way to the Jeep without a scratch. )
customer_reviews.author: KWM1989

customer_reviews.title: came quickly and happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, as described, came quickly and happy with this item
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: As described. They look great. Recommend getting the rubber bushings also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, color is perfect .look super in front of the bumper.
customer_reviews.author: Reynaldo Nino

customer_reviews.title: Paint chips immediately
customer_reviews.text: Paint chipped off literally within 48 hours and looks just as bad as the ones I spray painted
customer_reviews.author: B. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Product looks good
customer_reviews.text: Based on initial inspection, these shackles appear to be very stout and the coating looks durable. Time and use will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Arisaka38

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great coating, and great product. They look great on my new Jeep bumper.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great looking product
customer_reviews.text: My husband got me ‘earrings’ for my Jeep. Shackles seem super strong and the color adds a great look to the front of the Wrangler.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Bad a$$
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty sweet. Fit well and tighten good so nobody can steal them.
customer_reviews.author: Lokey

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Beefy, perfect color...exactly what I was looking for...great accent to my off road vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: for logging
customer_reviews.text: i used these to move a few trees taht had fallen that i wanted to saw into planks. They helped me move a few massive trunks - my tractor was even slowing under the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron F.

customer_reviews.title: Pop
customer_reviews.text: Great product ive had them for a couple months and love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mickenzie

customer_reviews.title: shackles look great and feel tough
customer_reviews.text: Fit was just right on my 7/8 clevis mount holes, shackles look great and feel tough.
customer_reviews.author: AverageJoe

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Great, durable product. Some fading after the summer, but no rust! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Bartscht

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Nice product i was very surprised to see the packing, showing they care about their product.
customer_reviews.author: Tim matthews

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shackles
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Exactly as described and work great with recovery straps. And they look mighty cool too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Grave

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Paint scratches and I lost one on a trail after it vibrated loose and fell off my jeep Edit: I was offered either a refund or a replacement set and I was surprised on how quickly the set got to me
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Schoer

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking
customer_reviews.text: These D ring Shackles will dress up your truck !!!
customer_reviews.author: Blind Lemon Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Just what i wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, perfect condition and they look good! Have not experienced fading or pink tones as read in other reviews. Been on for about 2 months now through plenty of rain.
customer_reviews.author: Nikole

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: look great. good quality. Great price. Theres nothing I dont like about them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lowe

customer_reviews.title: just like my truck I hope never to need them but ...
customer_reviews.text: They are loud, just like my truck I hope never to need them but certainly glad I now have them.
customer_reviews.author: B n M

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Not the best paint quality, but they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: They are superheavy duty, and I love the way they look
customer_reviews.author: crobinson

customer_reviews.title: Ok pair of shackles
customer_reviews.text: They are ok, made in China so I didn't want to risk my safety.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: THESE LOOK GREAT
customer_reviews.text: these look and work fantastic i love them and they make my 4runner look good very happy with how they came out and a great deal for the low price
customer_reviews.author: paul corollo 3

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 they feel like good quality and they have a nice red color too them
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Flores

customer_reviews.title: Worth it great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality great paint finish must important will definitely do the job on the trail when I get stuck in a jam
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Trinidad

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great on my '14 4Runner. Heavy Duty indeed !
customer_reviews.author: Miss Nuno

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I just like them. They're shackles, with a durable finish
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Young

customer_reviews.title: Trust the quality
customer_reviews.text: Work well paint chipped a tad bit that’s after using them a pretty good amount. Look good and I trust the quality.
customer_reviews.author: blake

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: There awsome but will fade over time and turn pink
customer_reviews.author: paul gabrys

customer_reviews.title: The bright red color, fades after months...
customer_reviews.text: If you buy these, don't leave them on your vehicle. They fade quickly with exposure to the sun. I now have pink shackles.
customer_reviews.author: He's In There

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and durable
customer_reviews.text: Its been more than 3 month and looks like new!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Quesada

customer_reviews.title: strong
customer_reviews.text: nice finish and look like they will last a life time
customer_reviews.author: paul g.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, paint will fade
customer_reviews.text: Paint fades fast 2 weeks, other than that great quality, super tuff , look great after painting them with engine heat paint 1 year later no fading
customer_reviews.author: Jason Joyce

customer_reviews.title: ... the need to use them yet but they feel pretty sturdy. I don't expect any problems with them
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the need to use them yet but they feel pretty sturdy. I don't expect any problems with them
customer_reviews.author: Mike J

customer_reviews.title: However the powder coating looks great and the shackles seem well
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use them yet. However the powder coating looks great and the shackles seem well made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turned pink after 4 months very upset about this
customer_reviews.text: Disliked a lot would like my money back after four months they have turned pink
customer_reviews.author: Julie Wadkins

customer_reviews.title: Solid and really heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty shackles! Fit my bumper perfectly! Mounted to a RedRock 4x4 Stubby Front Bumper w/ Stinger - Winch Mount.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, buy it
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best additions to my truck, it requires some low voltage wiring with the adapters i ordered with this, so any electrical experience makes this easier, but overall took me an hour and half to get in my 2006 Toyota Tacoma. Has so many options, and with the Bluetooth and aux it makes listening to music so much easier!! definitely worth the buy if you have a vehicle like mine with a crap stock stereo system. 5 stars without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they look like they will do the
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them yet and hopefully I won't need them for some time, but when I do, they look like they will do the job
customer_reviews.author: LeeP

customer_reviews.title: Shackled
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shackles, very reasonably priced. Orange on a black Jeep looks good.
customer_reviews.author: krh316

customer_reviews.title: Solid. Red. Tough. Cool.
customer_reviews.text: They do what they do. Bright red makes everyone notice my bumper just a bit more in parking lots and traffic, which in turn makes them notice me and avoid accidents so there's that. Tried pulling with them against another Jeep to show tow-strap technique and they work. Solid. They're very easy to take on and off as well and the threading for the pin only bound slightly on the first time I took them apart and put them back together. No problems since.
customer_reviews.author: HomeSweetRoam

product_meta.title: Shackles 3/4" (2 PACK) LIBERRWAY D ring Shackle Rugged Unbreakable 28.5 Ton (57,000 Lbs) Maximum Break Strength with 7/8'' Pin Bow Screw Heavy Duty D Ring for Jeep Vehicle Recovery, Red
feature_bullets: ★ NOTE: 3/4" DIAMETER SHACKLE - With an Industry Standard 7/8" Screw Pin!
★ 28.5 TON BREAK STRENGTH - This Bowl Shackle is Certified 9,500 Lbs of Towing & Recovery Capacity in the Palm of Your Hand!
★ DOUBLE PROTECTION - LIBERRWAY D Ring Shackle is Galvanized and Powder Coated, Resulting In Incredible Strength and Quality!
★ FIT WELL - D Shackle works perfectly with all our tow straps, snatch straps, tree savers and snatch blocks
★ LIFETIME WARRANTY - 100% satisfaction guarantee, love them or get your money back!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars434 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
